Title: Requires the establishment of electronics and hazardous waste recycling programs in towns within Nassau and Suffolk counties
Summary: Requires the establishment of electronics and hazardous waste recycling programs in towns within Nassau and Suffolk counties for one year.
LawCode: Add ยง120-dd, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring the establishment of electronics and hazardous waste recycling programs in towns within Nassau and Suffolk counties; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
